channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES

item.title: Destiny 2: The Story So Far 2025
item.description: Do you have the heart of a Guardian?
item.content:encoded:
The Destiny 2 Story So Far 2025 Bundle gives you access to the Light & Darkness Saga. Purchase the right tier for you to complete the chapters you may have missed, or live the adventure to its thrilling end!

*Customers must download the free edition of Destiny 2 on Steam in order to redeem the keys for expansion content.
